topic.title: ZeroMail echobot not working for anyone else?
topic.body: First message appears to have failed to send, second and third received no echo reply... how long does it usually take?

1_1PoJALTLYV3CvytpitHoXDsjEhs44bhBZU.body: Just got replies.  It took 33 and 43 minutes respectively between sending and receiving my two test messages.
